response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional qualities and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a wise investment for you. Considering its true worth and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal while maximizing the return on my investment. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing the details further if you are interested.", "product_price": 950000}
